title: UPFA to launch manifesto, ‘Mahinda Chinthana – Lowa Dinana Maga’ today
content: The manifesto of the United People’s Freedom Alliance Presidential Candidate President Mahinda Rajapaksa ‘Mahinda Chinthana – Lowa Dinana Maga’ will be launched today at 9.00am in the BMICH under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa….
